tool.name: Update GFF3 from table
tool.description: Updates given GFF3 file with changes from the given tabular file. Requires an equivalent FASTA file as well to ensure correct reconstruction of the GFF3
tool.help:
**What it does**
Reads through a given tabular file and compares it against the given GFF3 file. If there are any differences, it updates the GFF3 file with the changes from the tabular file. The FASTA file is used to ensure correct reconstruction of the GFF3 after changes are made.
